Iljin Kim

Korean: 김일진

Birthday:

Age:

Group (1999-2000):
Hush

Introduction

Iljin Kim is a South Korean singer. She was a member of the girl duo Hush as Eeljin. She went onto debut as a solo singer to release her own self-titled studio album, Eeljin on March 1, 2002. She later went inactive to continue pursuing her education to earn a Masters degree from the University of Music and Performing Arts Vienna. She returned in 2009 to release classical music studio album. She returned to mainstream pop and music in 2014 when she re-branded as 'Jane', and then eventually to her real name 'Iljin Kim'. She work as singer and music producer to this day.
